Balletts. Italian
titleStmt.author: Morley, Thomas, 1557-1603?
Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: An Italian version of "Balletts". The authorship of the words has been attributed to Michael Drayton.
Five partbooks, each with separate dated title page and collation. At head of title, part 1, "Canto."; part 2, "Alto."; part 3, "Tenore."; part 4, "Basso."; part 5, "Quinto.".
The roman numeral date is made with turned C's.
